title: Handle an ADA Compliance Complaint
description: A passenger in a wheelchair reports that a bus driver refused to let them board because the driver claimed they were taking too long. A manager must investigate this serious complaint.

tasks.expected_outcome: A new complaint case is opened and flagged as high-priority.

tasks.description: Identify the driver and review the on-board video footage of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The video is retrieved for review.

tasks.description: The video confirms the passenger's account. The driver violated ADA policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The complaint is substantiated by evidence.

tasks.description: The driver is immediately removed from service pending a disciplinary hearing and mandatory ADA retraining.
tasks.expected_outcome: Immediate and appropriate action is taken in response to the serious violation.
